@mm7700 - That is very wierd. The only problems i cant think of would be, A.. stop using maxwell DVD+R DL disc and use Verbatim. If you can't get a hold of Verbatim. Try memorax. B.. your dvd burner just may not have what it needs to do to burn the disc properly. For instance, I have an LG DVD burner and they are known to have problems burning games. But, I have been lucky to no have any problems.

THIS game isnt working. The verification process failed through ABGX. heres the message : "There is no verified rip of XEX CRC 981EBE7A in the online database. Failed to find a verified ini file for this XEX". SO there you go. CHris, Please prove me wrong. I'm hoping you do

This game is not verified. I just ran it through ABGX and it still couldnt verify the CRC through ABGX. i dont know what Chris-Aksel is saying but i hope he proves me wrong. Also, ive been burning and patching games for years now. Chris please prove me wrong

There are no less than 4 versions of this game released in the world. Each one has it's own CRC. Regardless if a game is region free and can play on any console, every region still gets it's own pressing. 

It will be verified in ABGX360 when someone finally gets around to uploading a verified topology data set taken from a region version of the game that matches the one Complex got their hands on, and not before. Deal with it or download one of the other two versions that have been verified so far.

Better yet, just go BUY THE FUCKING GAME, then you won't have to worry about it. Problem solved. 

No one owes anyone anything, remember that next time you ignorant ungrateful entitlement dip-shits decide to bitch and piss and moan about FREE shit. This is exactly why piracy is supposed to be a "privilege" for those that know what the fuck they are doing (as it used to be for decades), and not an entitlement by everyone who is unable/unwilling to learn or make an effort.
